snippet: A rolling borderland of onion farms and strip malls provides a test tube of sorts for observing how the minimum wage works in daily life.
abstract: Cross-section of minimum wage migrants are traveling from homes in Idaho to jobs in Oregon, where minimum wage is $1.85 higher; situation provides testing ground for observing how minimum wage works in daily life and how differences in rate can affect local economy in unexpected ways.
lead_paragraph: A rolling borderland of onion farms and strip malls provides a test tube of sorts for observing how the minimum wage works in daily life.

headline.main: Crossing Borders and Changing Lives, Lured by Higher State Minimum Wages
headline.print_headline: Crossing Borders and Changing Lives, Lured by Higher State Minimum Wages
